generated.css: .userWidget{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;flex-wrap:nowrap;margin-left:auto}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.userWidget{flex-direction:row}}.userWidgetImg{object-fit:cover;width:25px;height:25px;border-radius:50%}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.userWidgetImg{width:38px;height:38px}}.userWidgetName{font-size:.75rem;font-weight:400;color:#f8f8f8;margin:5px 0 0}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.userWidgetName{font-size:1rem;color:#5f9cd1;margin:0 0 0 10px;padding:0}}
